The campos API reference¶

Package members¶

campos.get_forms(obj, source_kw={}, form_kw={})[source]¶

Creates ready to use New and Edit forms using obj as fields source.

Finds a FieldSource to extract fields from obj and pass source_kw to source’s constructor.

Parameters:
  • obj – the object used to obtain fields
  • source_kw (dict) – keyword arguments to pass to source constructor, see FieldSource for more details
  • form_kw (dict) – keyword arguments to pass to form constructor, see Form for more details
Returns:

a tuple like CreationForm , EditionForm
Return type:

tuple
